article_title: It has broken me, says British father of twins killed on 7 October.

article_title: It has broken me, says British father of twins killed on 7 October.
sentence: Yannai  and  Liel  Hetzroni-Heller,  12-year-old  twins,  were  killed  during  the  Hamas  attack  on  the  Kibbutz  Be'eri  on  7  October.

article_title: It has broken me, says British father of twins killed on 7 October.
sentence: The  twins  were  raised  in  Israel  by  their  great-aunt,  who  was  also  killed.
